details.arabic_diacless: رب هب لى من لدنك ذرية طيبة‌ ۚانك سميع الدعاء‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِىۡ مِنۡ لَّدُنۡكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً‌ ۚاِنَّكَ سَمِيۡعُ الدُّعَآءِ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee min ladunka thurriyyatan tayyibatan innaka samee ud duaa
details.translations: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.
